mapper.select:
select a.*,b.*,c.*,d.* from ECM_MIDWARE_KAFKAINT a,ECM_MIDWARE_INFO b,ECM_MIDWARE_VER c, ECM_SERVER_INFO d where a.MIDWARE_ID=b.MIDWARE_ID and a.SER_ID=d.SER_ID and b.MIDWARE_VER_ID=c.MIDWARE_VER_ID
AND a.MIDWARE_ID=#{midwareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.*,b.*,c.*,d.* from ECM_MIDWARE_KAFKAINT a,ECM_MIDWARE_INFO b,ECM_MIDWARE_VER c, ECM_SERVER_INFO d where a.MIDWARE_ID=#{midwareId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.MIDWARE_ID=b.MIDWARE_ID and a.SER_ID=d.SER_ID and b.MIDWARE_VER_ID=c.MIDWARE_VER_ID
mapper.update:
update ECM_MIDWARE_KAFKAINT
SER_ID = #{serId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KAFKAINT_NAME = #{kafkaintName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KAFKAINT_PORT = #{kafkaintPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KAFKAINT_DESC = #{kafkaintDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KAFKAINT_STATUS = #{kafkaintStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where KAFKAINT_ID = #{kafkaintId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into ECM_MIDWARE_KAFKAINT
KAFKAINT_ID,
MIDWARE_ID,
SER_ID,
KAFKAINT_NAME,
KAFKAINT_DESC,
KAFKAINT_STATUS,
KAFKAINT_PORT,
